title: Possessed pickaxe

properties.name: description
properties.value: Possessed pickaxes are an animated NPC found in the Haunted Mine and the Catacombs of Kourend. They look like a normal pickaxe until the player walks past them, when they become animated. Possessed pickaxes are weak against magic and crushing attacks.

Possessed pickaxes are an animated NPC found in the Haunted Mine and the Catacombs of Kourend. They look like a normal pickaxe until the player walks past them, when they become animated. Possessed pickaxes are weak against magic and crushing attacks.

  • 2 Haunted Mine drops

  • 4 Changes

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
22 January 2007
(update)

The NPC was renamed from "Possessed Pickaxe" to "Possessed pickaxe".

16 May
13 June 2006

The NPC on the ground was renamed from "Bronze pickaxe" to "Iron pickaxe".
